channel.title: Have an NPC give items?
channel.description:
I was wondering how I gave the EASTER BUNNY (1835) dialog where he would give a BASKET OF EGGS (4565) for a holiday?
Please help, hybridpvp base.

item.title: Have an NPC give items?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Assuming HybridPVP is PI.

DialogueHandler class add cases with the dialogues, there are numerous tutorials on how to do dialogues.
I would recommend adding a playersave token for this so they cannot abuse the system and get multiple baskets.

c.getItems().addItem(basketId, 1);

within the dialogue case, remember to add that check or this will be abused

Read full topic
